headline: Is Entergy Still a Smart Pick After 28% Rally and Grid Modernization News?
summary: Thinking about what to do with Entergy stock right now? You are not alone. After all, when a company climbs an impressive 28.1% year-to-date and has more than doubled over the past three years, plenty of investors start to wonder if the good times will keep rolling or if it is time to rethink. In the past month alone, Entergy’s shares ticked up another 5.4%, building on a steady pattern of growth. In fact, over five years, the stock is up an eye-catching 130.0%. Such numbers reflect shifting...
